pkgmetadata.longdescription: # installer<!-- start readme-pitch -->This is a low-level library for installing a Python package from a[wheel distribution](https://packaging.python.org/glossary/#term-Wheel). Itprovides basic functionality and abstractions for handling wheels and installingpackages from wheels.- Logic for "unpacking" a wheel (i.e. installation).- Abstractions for various parts of the unpacking process.- Extensible simple implementations of the abstractions.- Platform-independent Python script wrapper generation.<!-- end readme-pitch -->You can read more in the [documentation](https://installer.rtfd.io/).
